segments.text: Sorry to bother you . But I ’ m having a small problem I thought you might be able to help me with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it is about Ms . Connors , the landlord of our rented house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The dishwasher broke down . I had the repair done and deducted the cost from the rent check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She is threatening to evict us for not paying the full rent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hold on , Paula . It does sound pretty serious . But I ’ m sure you can work this out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you are over at the law school . So I wondered if you would mind coming with me when we talk to Ms . Connors . We ’ re supposed to meet with her tomorrow night at eight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I ’ d be glad to help you straighten things out . Why don ’ t I stop by at about seven thirty ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a million , you are a lifesaver .
segments.speaker: S1
